colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @026A *, ,(CES RIN CHE MANG SPRUL RGYAL PO RNAM THOS SRAS KYI BSANGS MCHOD DNGOS GRUB CHAR CHEN 'BEBS PA'I SPRIN GYI RNGA BSANGS CES BYA BA 'DI YANG, BSTAN BSRUNGS CHEN PO KHYAD PAR 'PHAGS PA 'DI NYID LA BSANGS MCHOD KYIS DGYIS PA BSKYED CING DNGOS GRUB ZHU BA'I CHO GA RGYAS SHING CHA TSANG BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG RANG NYID NAS 'BRI 'DUN YOD PA'I KHAR, DAD BRTZON LHAG BSAM DANG LDAN PA BKA' BCU 'PHRIN LAS DON YOD NAS BSKUL MA BYUNG BAS 'TSAMS SBYAR STE, GSANG BDAG NGAG GI DBANG PO DANG KHYAB BDAG 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD SPRUL SOGS YONGS 'DZIN DAM PA DU MA'I DU MA'I DRIN LAS, RGYAL PO CHEN PO 'DI NYID KYI RJE GNANG GI RIM PA DANG LUNG MAN NGAG SOGS PHRAN BU 'DZIN PA'I, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RIG PA 'DZIN PA'I THA SHAL PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GIS RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU PHAG SNRON ZLA'I YAR TSES BCO LNGA'I NYIN ME TOG RNAM PAR BKRA BA'I LDING KHANG DGE 'PHEL BYANG CHUB GLING GI BSAM GTAN GYI KHANG BUR DGE SBYOR MTSAMS BCAD KYI THUN 'TSAMS SU GRUB PAR BGYI PA 'DIS KYANG, RGYAL PO CHEN POS 'PHRIN LAS GA-YEL MED DU MDZAD CING, 'GRO KUN PHONGS PA'I GDUNG PA ZHI NAS 'DOD DGU'I 'BYOR BA DBYAR MTSO LTAR RGYAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
